subject: Call for Papers:: DEIS2013: Conference on e-learning, networks, computing, security and technologies
body:
The Second International Conference on Digital Enterprise and Information Systems (DEIS 2013)
Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
March 4-6, 2013
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia1/

CALL FOR RESEARCHED PAPERS 
--------------------------
Deadline: January 3, 2013

The DEIS2013 covers e-technologies, computing, networks, software engineering, network security and experience in applying recent research advances to real-world problems. We invite submissions in any of the following example areas and in other areas:

+ Anti-cyberterrorism
+ Biometrics Technologies
+ Cloud, Grid, and Green Computing
+ Computer Forensics, Computer Security
+ Computer Crime Prevention and Detection
+ Confidentiality Protection
+ Critical Infrastructure Management
+ Critical Computing and Storage
+ Cryptography and Data Protection
+ Data Compression
+ Data Mining
+ Data Stream Processing in Mobile/Sensor Networks
+ Data and Information Quality
+ Distributed and Parallel Applications
+ E-Technology, E-Learning, and E-Government
+ Fuzzy and Neural Network Systems
+ Image Processing
+ Internet Modeling
+ Information Ethics
+ Mobile Networking, Mobility and Nomadicity
+ Mobile, Ad Hoc and Sensor Network Management
+ Network Security
+ Quality of Service, Scalability and Performance
+ Sensor Networks and Social Sensing
+ Semantic Web, Ontologies
+ Social Networks
+ Social Search
+ Software Engineering
+ Soft Computing Techniques
+ Wireless Communications

Submitted paper should not exceed 15 pages, including illustrations. Best papers awards will be distributed during the conference.

Papers should be submitted electronically as MS word or pdf format without author(s) name. You can submit your researched paper at

http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia1/paper-submission/. 

The papers should be prepared following the instructions specified here : 

http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia1/camera-ready/. 

If you have problems regarding on submitting your paper(s), you can email us at de@sdiwc.net. We will contact you shortly. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Further inquiries should be sent to the DEIS2013 Program Chair: 

Ali Dehghan Tanha, University Putra Malaysia, Malaysia
de@sdiwc.net

Jan Platos, VSB-Technical University of Ostrava, Czech Republic
sdiwc@sdiwc.net
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Liezelle Ann Canadilla
Conference Manager
The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC)
de@sdiwc.net
